title: Radio & Music Services
description: We encapsulate Radio & Music business logic for iPlayer Radio and BBC Music products on all platforms. We add value by reliably providing the right blend of metadata needed by clients.

getMusicPopularArtists.title: Popular Artists
getMusicPopularArtists.description: List of Most Popular artists from BBC Music.

getMusicPopularPlaylists.title: Popular Playlists
getMusicPopularPlaylists.description: List of Most Popular playlists from BBC Music.

getMusicPopularTracks.title: Popular Tracks
getMusicPopularTracks.description: List of popular tracks for BBC Music. Filter by time, network, artist, playlist or programme.

get_my_categories_follows.title: List of followed categories
get_my_categories_follows.description: List of followed categories for a given user.

getMusicExport.title: Music Exports
getMusicExport.description: Returns status of all previous third party export actions for a given BBC Music user.

getMusicExportJobs.title: Music Export Jobs
getMusicExportJobs.description: All items associated to a users export request

postMusicExportJob.title: Music Export Jobs
postMusicExportJob.description: Create Export Job for a user

getMusicExportTracks.title: Music Export Tracks
getMusicExportTracks.description: Retrieves vendor and status specific tracks

getPersonalisedMusicFavourites.title: Favourite Tracks or Clips
getPersonalisedMusicFavourites.description: List of favourited tracks and clips for a given user for BBC Music.

postPersonalisedMusicFavouritesBatch.title: Favourite Tracks or Clips
postPersonalisedMusicFavouritesBatch.description:
Add multiple tracks and/or clips to a BBC Music user's favourites.

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

putPersonalisedMusicFavouritesBatch.title: Favourite Tracks or Clips
putPersonalisedMusicFavouritesBatch.description:
Update tracks or clips from a BBC Music user favourites.

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

getPersonalisedMusicFavouritesByType.title: Favourite Tracks or Clips by Type
getPersonalisedMusicFavouritesByType.description: List of favourited tracks or clips for a given user for BBC Music.

deletePersonalisedMusicFavouritesByTypeB.title: Favourite Track or Clip
deletePersonalisedMusicFavouritesByTypeB.description: Delete track or clip from a BBC Music user favourites.

getPersonalisedMusicFavouritesByTypeById.title: Favourite Track or Clip
getPersonalisedMusicFavouritesByTypeById.description: Check to see if a single track or clip entity is in a users favourites - determines UX of add button.

postPersonalisedMusicFavouritesByTypeByI.title: Favourite Track or Clip
postPersonalisedMusicFavouritesByTypeByI.description:
Add track or clip to a BBC Music user favourites.

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

putPersonalisedMusicFavouritesByTypeById.title: Favourite Track or Clip
putPersonalisedMusicFavouritesByTypeById.description:
Update tracks or clips from a BBC Music user favourites.

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

getPersonalisedMusicFollows.title: Followed Networks, Categories, Artists, Playlists and Genres
getPersonalisedMusicFollows.description: List of followed networks, categories, artists, playlists and genres for a given user for BBC Music.

postPersonalisedMusicFollowsBatch.title: Followed Networks, Categories, Artists, Playlists and Genres
postPersonalisedMusicFollowsBatch.description:
Add networks, categories, artists, playlists, networks, genres or services in a users follows

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

putPersonalisedMusicFollowsBatch.title: Followed Networks, Categories, Artists, Playlists and Genres
putPersonalisedMusicFollowsBatch.description:
Update networks, categories, artists, playlists, networks, genres or services in a users follows

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

getPersonalisedMusicFollowsByType.title: Followed Networks, Categories, Artists, Playlists and Genres by Type
getPersonalisedMusicFollowsByType.description: List of followed networks, categories, artists, playlists, networks, genres, categories or services for a given BBC Music user.

deletePersonalisedMusicFollowsByTypeById.title: Followed Network, Category, Artist, Playlist and Genre
deletePersonalisedMusicFollowsByTypeById.description: Remove a single network, category, artist, playlist, network, genre or service entity is in a users follows

getPersonalisedMusicFollowsByTypeById.title: Followed Network, Category, Artist, Playlist and Genre
getPersonalisedMusicFollowsByTypeById.description: Check to see if a single network, category, artist, playlist, network, genre or service entity is in a users follows - determines UX of add button.

postPersonalisedMusicFollowsByTypeById.title: Followed Network, Category, Artist, Playlist and Genre
postPersonalisedMusicFollowsByTypeById.description:
Add a single network, category, artist, playlist, network, genre or service entity is in a users follows

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

putPersonalisedMusicFollowsByTypeById.title: Followed Network, Category, Artist, Playlist and Genre
putPersonalisedMusicFollowsByTypeById.description:
Update a single network, category, artist, playlist, network, genre or service entity is in a users follows

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

deleteMusicPreferencesExport.title: Music Export Preferences
deleteMusicPreferencesExport.description: Remove export preferences (e.g. 3rd party vendors, partner id's) for a given BBC Music user.

getMusicPreferencesExport.title: Music Export Preferences
getMusicPreferencesExport.description: Returns export preferences (e.g. 3rd party vendors, partner id's) for a given BBC Music user.

postMusicPreferencesExport.title: Music Export Preferences
postMusicPreferencesExport.description: Create export preferences (e.g. 3rd party vendors, partner id's) for a given BBC Music user.

deleteMusicPreferencesExportVendor.title: Music Export Vendor Preferences
deleteMusicPreferencesExportVendor.description: Remove Vendor specific export preferences (e.g. 3rd party vendors, partner id's) for a given BBC Music user.

getMusicPreferencesExportVendor.title: Music Export Vendor Preferences
getMusicPreferencesExportVendor.description: Returns vendor specific export preferences for a given BBC Music user.

postMusicPreferencesExportVendor.title: Music Export Vendor Preferences
postMusicPreferencesExportVendor.description: Create Vendor specific export preferences (e.g. 3rd party vendors, partner id's) for a given BBC Music user.

putMusicPreferencesExportVendor.title: Music Export Vendor Preferences
putMusicPreferencesExportVendor.description: Update vendor specific export preferences for a given BBC Music user.

get_my_networks_follows.title: List of followed networks
get_my_networks_follows.description: List of followed networks for a given user.

getRecommendations.title: Recommended Programmes
getRecommendations.description: Recommended Programmes from the Audience Platforms' Recomendations Service

getPersonalisedRadioFavourites.title: Favourite Episodes and Clips
getPersonalisedRadioFavourites.description:
List of favourited episodes and clips for a given user for iPlayer Radio.

N.B.  Swagger schemas cannot currently handle multiple combinations of object in an array i.e. a mix of Episode
and Clip Summaries so we are defining data as a Programme Summary here.  This will be resolved in V3 with full support for
 anyOf https://www.openapis.org/blog/2017/01/24/a-new-year-a-new-specification

postPersonalisedRadioBatch.title: Favourite Episodes and Clips
postPersonalisedRadioBatch.description:
Add User favourites

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

putPersonalisedRadioBatch.title: Favourite Episodes and Clips
putPersonalisedRadioBatch.description:
Update user favourites

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

getPersonalisedRadioFavouritesByType.title: Favourite Episodes and Clips by Type
getPersonalisedRadioFavouritesByType.description:
List of followed 'clips' or 'episode' items for a given iPlayer Radio user

N.B.  Swagger schemas cannot currently handle multiple combinations of object in an array i.e. a mix of Episode
and Clip Summaries so we are defining data as a Programme Summary here.  This will be resolved in V3 with full support for
 anyOf https://www.openapis.org/blog/2017/01/24/a-new-year-a-new-specification

getPersonalisedRadioByActivityTypeById.title: Favourite Episode or Clip
getPersonalisedRadioByActivityTypeById.description:
Check to see if a single clip or episode entity is in a users favourites - determines UX of add button.

N.B.  Swagger schemas cannot currently handle multiple combinations of object in an array i.e. a mix of Episode
and Clip Summaries so we are defining data as a Programme Summary here.  This will be resolved in V3 with full support for
 anyOf https://www.openapis.org/blog/2017/01/24/a-new-year-a-new-specification

postPersonalisedRadioByActivityTypeById.title: Favourite Episode or Clip
postPersonalisedRadioByActivityTypeById.description:
Add User favourite

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

putPersonalisedRadioByActivityTypeById.title: Favourite Episode or Clip
putPersonalisedRadioByActivityTypeById.description:
Update user favourite

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

getPersonalisedRadioFollows.title: Followed Brands and Series
getPersonalisedRadioFollows.description:
List of favourited brands and series for a given user for iPlayer Radio.

N.B.  Swagger schemas cannot currently handle multiple combinations of object in an array i.e. a mix of Episode
and Clip Summaries so we are defining data as a Programme Summary here.  This will be resolved in V3 with full support for
 anyOf https://www.openapis.org/blog/2017/01/24/a-new-year-a-new-specification

postPersonalisedRadioFollowsBatch.title: Followed Brands and Series
postPersonalisedRadioFollowsBatch.description:
Add 'brand' or 'series' items to a users iPlayer Radio follows

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

putPersonalisedRadioFollowsBatch.title: Followed Brands and Series
putPersonalisedRadioFollowsBatch.description:
Update 'brands' or 'series' items from a users iPlayer Radio follows

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

getPersonalisedRadioFollowsByType.title: Followed Brands or Series by Type
getPersonalisedRadioFollowsByType.description:
List of followed 'brand' or 'series' items for a given iPlayer Radio user

N.B.  Swagger schemas cannot currently handle multiple combinations of object in an array i.e. a mix of Episode
and Clip Summaries so we are defining data as a Programme Summary here.  This will be resolved in V3 with full support for
 anyOf https://www.openapis.org/blog/2017/01/24/a-new-year-a-new-specification

deletePersonalisedRadioFollowsByTypeById.title: Followed Brand or Series
deletePersonalisedRadioFollowsByTypeById.description: Remove 'brand' or 'series' items from a users iPlayer Radio follows

getPersonalisedRadioFollowsByTypeById.title: Followed Brand or Series
getPersonalisedRadioFollowsByTypeById.description: Check to see if a single brand or series entity is in a users follows - determines UX of add button.

postPersonalisedRadioFollowsByTypeById.title: Followed Brand or Series
postPersonalisedRadioFollowsByTypeById.description:
Add 'brand' or 'series' items from a users iPlayer Radio follows

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

putPersonalisedRadioFollowsByTypeById.title: Followed Brand or Series
putPersonalisedRadioFollowsByTypeById.description:
Update 'brand' or 'series' items from a users iPlayer Radio follows

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

getPersonalisedRadioPlays.title: Played Episode or Clip
getPersonalisedRadioPlays.description:
Returns mixed episode and clip plays for a given BBC iPlayer radio user.

N.B.  Swagger schemas cannot currently handle multiple combinations of object in an array i.e. a mix of Episode
and Clip Summaries so we are defining data as a Programme Summary here.  This will be resolved in V3 with full support for
 anyOf https://www.openapis.org/blog/2017/01/24/a-new-year-a-new-specification

getPodcastByPid.title: Podcast
getPodcastByPid.description: Retrieve data about the podcast with the supplied PID

getPodcastEpisodes.title: Podcast Episodes
getPodcastEpisodes.description: Retrieve all episodes for a specific podcast

getRadioNetworks.title: Networks
getRadioNetworks.description: All iPlayer Radio networks - contains business logic for masterbrand and service relationships

getRadioProgrammes.title: Radio programmes
getRadioProgrammes.description:
Provides a paginated list of programmes by PID (brand, series, episode and clip). Accepts various filters and sorting methods.

N.B.  Swagger schemas cannot currently handle multiple combinations of object in an array i.e. a mix of Episode
and Clip Summaries so we are defining results as an array of Programme Summary here.  This will be resolved in V3 with full support for
 anyOf https://www.openapis.org/blog/2017/01/24/a-new-year-a-new-specification

getRadioProgrammesByPid.title: Available radio programme by Pid
getRadioProgrammesByPid.description:
Find programmes by PID (brand, series, episode and clip)

N.B.  Swagger schemas cannot currently handle multiple combinations of object in an array i.e. a mix of Episode
and Clip Summaries so we are defining results as an array of Programme Summary here.  This will be resolved in V3 with full support for
 anyOf https://www.openapis.org/blog/2017/01/24/a-new-year-a-new-specification
